name: GMTK Game Jam 2020
description:
Game for the GMTK Game Jam 2020  https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

Every turn, you choose your next 5 actions.
When you start the round, you and your enemy are executing these actions in succession. (Your action will always go first)

To win one must either move on the other ones field or hit the other one with an attack.

Controls:
- Pan the camera
- Zoom the camera
- Choose Action/Field

Mouse and keyboard required to play.
